text: Wolfhound () is a 1991 Soviet action film by Mikhail Tumanishvili. == Cast == * Inara Slucka * Aleksei Guskov * Anatoli Romashin * Valeri Barinov * Aleksandr Fatyushin * Aleksandr Ilyin * Vladimir Ilyin * Vladimir Serdyukov * Vladimir Troshin * Vladimir Basov, Jr. * Maria Vinogradova * Oksana Arbuzova * Vitali Moskalenko * Yuri Shumilo ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:1991 in the Soviet Union Category:Mosfilm films Category:1990s crime action films Category:Soviet films Category:Soviet crime action films Category:Russian crime action films Category:Films directed by Mikhail Tumanishvili
title: Wolfhound (1991 film)
